TestCaseMetaData.name: PT and INR
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The EHR-S creates and delivers a simple electronic lab order message to the LIS. The LIS receives the messages and creates and sends a system level and application level acknowledgement messages back to the EHR-S. The EHR-S receives the acknowledgement messages and sends a system level acknowledgement message back to the LIS in response to the application level acknowledgement message.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support minimally populated messages (single occurrences of all required ("R") elements).
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: The initial test plan is a "smoke test" to reveal simple failures severe enough to preclude further testing.
